text: K. Sukumaran (born 12 July 1930) is an Indian politician and lawyer. He was born in Kerala, India. Until her death in 2020, he was married to K. K. Usha. He was a judge on the Kx'lwmLslsserala High Court between 1981 to 1991 and on the Bombay High Court between 1991 to 1992. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:Indian judges
title: K. Sukumaran (judge)
